starters.name: Golden Platter
starters.description: This all in one platter comes with Egg Rolls, Shrimp Rolls, Crab Rangoon Rolls, and Wings

starters.name: Egg Rolls (Szaw Yaw)
starters.description: These crispy bites are filled with ground pork, vermicili noodles, cabbage, carrots and taro

starters.name: Spring Rolls (Nam Chow)
starters.description: made to order rolled in rice paper, comes with pork and shrimp, cucumber carrotts, bean sprouts, mint and vermicili dipped in either fish sauce or peanut sauce

starters.name: Crab Rangoon Rolls (Kdam Roum)
starters.description: Crab Rangoon Filling rolled in a spring roll wrap and deep fried to a crispy crunch.

starters.name: Shrimp Rolls (Pakea Roum)
starters.description: Lightly seasoned shrimp rolled in a spring roll wrap and fried for a crispy bite

starters.name: Lemon Grass Beef Skewers (Sach Ko Chakak)
starters.description: Marinated with the Cambodian traditional lemongrass beef skewers

starters.name: Lemon Grass Chicken Skewers (Sach Mon Chakak)
Beef Jerky (Sach Ko Nyeat)
starters.description: Thinly sliced beef seasoned and dehydrated to a chip 2.5 ounces

starters.name: Banana Fritters (Jake Chean)
starters.description: Namva bananas battered and deep fried and topped off with black sesame seeds

rice_plates.name: Combination Special (Bai Srope)
rice_plates.description: This triple delight plate comes with Loc Lak (beef), Wings, and Pork chops and served with jasmine or fried rice.

rice_plates.name: Diced Beef & Rice (Bai Loc Lak)
rice_plates.description: This hearty meal has al the beef. Shredded beef stir fry topped with cilantro and black pepper is served with jasmine rice or fried rice

rice_plates.name: Porkchops & Rice (Bai Sach Chrouk)
rice_plates.description: Marinated center cut pork chops seared and caramelized to a finger licking deliciousness is served with jasmine or fried rice.

rice_plates.name: Wings & Rice (Bai Slap Mon)
rice_plates.description: Your favorite wings (choose wing flavor or not) served with jasmine or fried rice

rice_plates.name: Ginger Stir Fry & Rice (Cha Kanye)
rice_plates.description: Thinly sliced beef or chicken stir fried with finely diced ginger that packs the kick you want for your taste buds. Served with jasmine or fried rice

rice_plates.name: Crispy Chicken & Rice (Bai Sach Mon)
rice_plates.description: Breaded chicken is crispy on every bite. Served with jasmine or fried rice. Make sure you add that sweet chili sauce to this dish.

rice_plates.name: Traditional Stir Fry & Rice (Cha Kreung)
rice_plates.description: Heavy on the lemongrass paste this dish is a traditional stir fry. served with jasmine or fried rice. Crushed peanut served on the side. Can be made spicy to your liking.

noodle_plates.name: Lo Mien (Mee Cha)
noodle_plates.description: Yellow egg noodles pan fried and mixed with finely cut cabbage and carrots.

noodle_plates.name: Flat Rice Noodles (Mekathang)
noodle_plates.description: Watch out for that food coma coming your way with his plate. Flat rice noodles pan fried with Chinese broccoli, carrots, straw mushrooms and baby corn. Can be served saucy or dry.

noodle_plates.name: Vermicelli Salad (Banh Zong)
noodle_plates.description: Vermicelli white rice noodles mixed with bean sprouts, lettuce, cucumbers and carrots is served with strips of pork and egg rolls. Crushed peanuts and fish sauce are served on the side

noodle_plates.name: Round Rice Noodles (Lort Cha)
noodle_plates.description: Also known as a tear drop noodle, this dish is a very popular Cambodian street food that is served with bean sprouts and chives. Crushed peanuts and fish sauce is served on the side.

noodle_plates.name: Pad Thai (Kathiew Cha)
noodle_plates.description: Cambodian take on pad thai is tossed with scallion and bean sprouts. crushed peanuts and fish sauce is served on the side.

soup.name: Rice Noodle Soup
soup.description: Soul warming soup is sure to satisfy. Our version of "Pho"' one major difference is that we don't use star anis and cinnamon sticks in our broth, rather cabbage and carrots.

soup.name: Khmer Ramen
soup.description: Wei Wei Ramen served with bok choy and sprouts and choice of meat or not.

soup.name: Bean Thread Soup
soup.description: This super vegetarian special comes with straw and enoki mushrooms, bok choy, sprouts and baby corn. The noodles in this soup are made from bean threads.

little_monkeys.name: 2 Wings, 2 Egg Rolls & Rice
little_monkeys.description: Two wings, two egg rolls and rice or lo mien.

little_monkeys.name: 2 Beef Skewers, 2 Egg Rolls & Rice
little_monkeys.description: Two beef skewers, two egg rolls, and rice or lo mien.

little_monkeys.name: 2 Chicken Skewers, 2 Egg Rolls & Rice
little_monkeys.description: Two chicken skewers, two egg rolls with rice or lo mien

little_monkeys.name: 3 Fingers & Fries
little_monkeys.description: Crispy chicken cut to three fingers and fries

salads.name: Papaya Salad
salads.description: Shredded Young papaya tossed into a pestle and mortar along with tomatoes, carrots, and green beans. How spicy do you want it?

salads.name: Steak Salad
salads.description: Thinly sliced steak over a plate of mixed greens including red and green peppers, green beans cabbage and red cabbage and sprouts.

salads.name: Cambodian Slaw
salads.description: Shredded chicken tossed in a bed of cabbage, peppers, carrots and sprouts and served with fish sauce dressing.

vegetarian.name: Pan Fried Five Vegtables
vegetarian.description: Green and red peppers pan fried with carrots, broccoli and green beans.

vegetarian.name: Tofu Stir Fry
vegetarian.description: Tasty tofu is a plant based protein that both meat lovers and vegetarians may enjoy. this dish pairs tofu with fresh chives and bean sprouts to pack the perfect dish

sides.name: Khmer Fried Rice
sides.description: Our fried rice consist of pork and Chinese sausage that is mixed with peas and carrots to round out the ingredients in the house fried rice

sides.name: Jasmine Rice
sides.description: Jasmine rice is a staple to South East Asia and is the base to all our rice plates.

canned.name: Coca-Cola
canned.description: Coca-Cola's crisp, refreshing taste has stood the test of time since 1886.

canned.name: Diet Coke
canned.description: Enjoy a break with Diet Coke, the perfect no-sugar, no-calorie companion.

canned.name: Sprite
canned.description: Sprite's cool and crisp lemon-lime flavor will keep you invigorated and inspired.
